text: Yerulan Askakovich Iskakov (Russian: Ерулан Аскарович Искаков: born 24 June 1988) is a heavyweight Greco-Roman wrestler from Kazakhstan. He won bronze medals at the 2014 and 2018 Asian Games and 2017 and 2018 Asian championships. He won the Asian championships in 2014. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Kazakhstani male sport wrestlers Category:Wrestlers at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Wrestlers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Kazakhstan
title: Yerulan Iskakov
